sentences.sContent: The new church was officially opened on July 5th.
sentences.sCn: 新教堂于7月5日正式启用。

sentences.sContent: Nothing has yet been officially announced.
sentences.sCn: 一切都还没有正式宣布。

sentences.sContent: The scheme was officially launched in May.
sentences.sCn: 该计划是在5月份正式实施的。

sentences.sContent: Has the company officially confirmed the appointment?
sentences.sCn: 公司正式证实这项任命了吗？
